cs213.photoAlbum.model

Interface BackendControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Backend, Control

    public interface BackendControl
    This interface lets the administrator create a user and delete a user, as well as list users and get users
    Author:
    Oskar Bero

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
